author: Mental Outlaw
description:
In this video I discuss how the CachyOS team is planning to develop a specialized version of the distro that's optimized for servers, this is a bold move considering cachy OS is a relatively new rolling release distro.  Will it be able to compete with Ubuntu and Debian?

Link to the FOSDEM19 talk about Netflix using FreeBSD in their CDN
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vcyQBup-Gto

title: CachyOS Is Coming For Your Server
